attributes.additional_details:
Kingdom of Swindon is currently a micronation claiming the Borough of Swindon and wants to be recognised as a country of the UK with a devolved government under the Queen.

Swindon needs a boost in tourism and needs change soon and that change is not being brought to us. Swindon would then be focused on more giving us city status ect. More Information on the Micronation here:
http://micronations.wikia.com/wiki/Kingdom_of_Swindon

No threat to the monarch of government is intended we just want Swindon's micronation to be recognised and made a official country of the UK.
